# Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**Document Details:**

*   **Solicitation Number:** MA068
*   **Reference Number:** cb-4974-46423630
*   **Amendment Number:** 3
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-04-21
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-05-24T15:00:00
*   **Amendment Date:** 2023-05-24
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-06-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-05-31

**Notice Details:**

*   **Procurement Category:** SRV
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Variations or combinations of the above methods

**Contract Details:**

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** National Capital Commission
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** 202-40 Elgin Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 1C7, Canada
*   **Contact Person:** Micheline Al-Koutsi
*   **Contact Email:** micheline.al-koutsi@ncc-ccn.ca
*   **Contact Phone:** (343) 552-5974

**Bid Instructions:**

*   **Bid Deadline:** May 24, 2023 at 3:00 pm EDT
*   **Return to:** National Capital Commission, Bid email address: Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca
*   **Note:** There is no public opening scheduled.

**Market Mistakes:**

*   **Trade Agreements:** *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:**
    *   National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery:**
    *   Ottawa

**File Links:**

*   [MA068 RFSO Electrical Services for Leased Properties](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4974/ma068-rfso-electrical-services-for-leased-properties.pdf)
*   [MA068 Addendum 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4974/ma068-addendum-
